name: Srujan Esanakarra
bio: Srujan is a sophomore majoring in Neuroscience and minoring in Computer Science. Heâ€™s a research assistant in the Lab for Clinical and Integrative Neuroscience, a peer educator, and a member of several volunteer service organizations. In his free time, he likes to watch movies and shows, read about current events and new ideas, stay active, and hang out with friends.
